name: Weed Em and Reap
description:
You are the GRIM REAPER. Play cards to harvest souls from cities. But don't get greedy! If the population of a city hits zero, it becomes BLIGHTED and can no longer grow additional souls for harvest.

Try to harvest the most souls in 5 turns!

A submission for Ludum Dare 52.

Zoe Helding (@FionaFenali) - Programmer

Maxie Knightley (@maxknightley) - Programmer and Musician

Noa Pallister (@inevitable_art]) - Artist
